CustomField.description: A number that controls the display order of nodes in the related list on the Parent Graph Capability's page layout. This is for administrative convenience and readability only; it does not affect the runtime execution order.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a number (e.g., 10, 20, 30) to control the visual sorting of nodes on the capability's page. Lower numbers appear first. This has no impact on how the graph actually runs.
CustomField.label: Execution Order
